name: gaia online turn gaia green
description:
a little script to turn parts of gaia green like the forums and the gold ammount and even your name.
EDIT: name no longer green on this script
additional_info:
sept 16th: will work with better gaia. however you must make the navbar black to see the menu. will work without better gaia just go to labs and make the navbar black as well. alot of other colors will not work well with the code so changing the color can make things look bad, also seems to make the little indents to the side look better.

EDIT: sept 22nd some serious changes were made to this code as too many things turned green, name and gold ammt and some random spots still turn green but not everything like before. also no longer must the navbar be black to make this work WILL WORK with the dumpster on the gaia upgrade as well too now

EDIT: oct 5th dropdown menu from name now have green links and the name has been changed to blue for various concerns
